MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description: Gmagon aims to provide amazing simple and powerful solutions for you.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.

English.Keywords: mp3 converter on mac, convert to mp3 on mac, any audio to mp3 converter mac, mac mp3 music converter, convert any video to mp3 on mac
English.Char_Desc_45: TryToMP3 is a Mac MP3 creator.
English.Char_Desc_80: TryToMP3 helps users convert a set of video and audio files to MP3 format on Mac
English.Char_Desc_250: TryToMP3 helps users convert a set of video and audio files to MP3 format on Mac quickly and easily.
English.Char_Desc_450: TryToMP3 is a Mac MP3 music converter. It is capable of converting audio files in various formats to MP3 format, for example, converting AAC to MP3, converting FLAC to MP3, converting AC3 to MP3, converting M4A to MP3 and more. Plus, our app allows you to extrat an audio track from a video and save it as MP3. This feature is useful when you want to save a particular song from a movie or a music video.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
TryToMP3 is a Mac MP3 music converter. It is capable of converting audio files in various formats to MP3 format, for example, converting AAC to MP3, converting FLAC to MP3, converting AC3 to MP3, converting M4A to MP3 and more. Plus, our app allows you to extrat an audio track from a video and save it as MP3. This feature is useful when you want to save a particular song from a movie or a music video.
This any video/audio to MP3 converter for Mac works with almost all video and audio formats and can convert multiple files simultaneously in a batch, saving them in the widely-accepted MP3 format. Just try it!
